title: need to know
body: I have Dj sona permenant skin but i dont have sona , so if im gona buy sona and claim the skin will  i gona get addiotnal skin like we get them by buying legendarys , or ultimate skins with essences. pls answer me

replies.body:
We only offered the promotion for a free *mystery skin* with the purchase or gift of a **Legendary** or **Ultimate** champion skin during [Snowdown](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/look-out-its-snowdown#legendary) and [Draven Day](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/draven-day-2016#section-axe). Additionally, these promotions were only during the specified dates for those promotions. 

Let me know if you have any questions.

You don't receive additional skins for purchasing a legendary or ultimate skin. This was event last year with Mystery Skin Chests and if you received a legendary or ultimate skin, you would have received another one for free.
